name: The dam flood
description:
The dam wall is breaking! The village down stream will be flooded.

Delay the wall from breaking until the villagers evacuate.

Collect wood by cutting down trees and go to the wall to patch it.

Once the evacuation has completed let the wall break as it's inevitable.

Controls:

Walk:  W A S D

Run:  Hold shift

Jump:  Space

Axe:  E / left mouse button
